TopicTitle: For those who have lose "faith" in KSP...

Articles.Content: Amazing video. Has to be one of the best I've ever seen. It's besides the point but when I saw the video at the end I was reminded of this song:

Ok dangit... now I'm going to do a Dunatian colony thing. NOT because of The Martian but rather this video and it's cinematography which was perfect. I actually have a lot of qualm's with the former so please don't draw that connection.

But that is a good video to help pluck up rusty players  !

2 hours ago, ZooNamedGames said:

Ok dangit... now I'm going to do a Dunatian colony thing. NOT because of The Martian but rather this video and it's cinematography which was perfect. I actually have a lot of qualm's with the former so please don't draw that connection.

But that is a good video to help pluck up rusty players  !

Go get BDB and use a MOL spacecraft to go there. That would be cool.

Time and Man alone....

Pretty cool vid. I do remember seeing it before.

idk, i may have gotten bored with the game, i put in a couple weeks every time a new version rolls around, but its still one of the best games i have ever played, and i was a 90s gamer. i tell other game communities/developers that they should take inspiration from ksp with what they have been able to pull off. before ksp if you wanted a newtonian space simulator, people would laugh at you and say that could never be fun, and every attempt was mediocre at best. they went with a genre nobody wanted and nailed it, and with mutual respect between community and devs. you just dont see a lot of that in today's game industry.

Edited October 2, 2016 by Nuke
Interesting, but I've seen it before somewhere... Not sure where though.
